parameters.name: valid
parameters.description: Validity flag codes valid data (bit 0), non-zero values are not necessarily valid (NUM_DISTS elements)

parameters.name: data_quality
parameters.description: ---> Quality flag (NUM_DISTS elements)

parameters.name: nbins
parameters.description: ---> Number of angluar bins (NUM_DISTS elements)

parameters.name: nenergy
parameters.description: ---> Number of energies (NUM_DISTS elements)

parameters.name: geom_factor
parameters.description: ---> GEOM_FACTOR, Geometrical factor used in calibration (NUM_DISTS elements)

parameters.name: gf_ind
parameters.description: ---> Index for the value of the Geometrical factor for data (NUM_DISTS elements)

parameters.name: mode_ind
parameters.description: ---> Index for the data mode (0-2 for survey data, 0-1 for burst data) (NUM_DISTS elements)

parameters.name: theta_shift
parameters.description: ---> Angular shift (NUM_DISTS elements)

parameters.name: theta_max
parameters.description: ---> Angular maximum (NUM_DISTS elements)

parameters.name: theta_min
parameters.description: ---> Angular minimum (NUM_DISTS elements)

parameters.name: bkg
parameters.description: Background counts array with dimensions (NUM_DISTS)

parameters.name: sc_pot
parameters.description: Spacecraft potential (NUM_DISTS elements)

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Burst Ion Raw Counts data with dimensions (96, 64, NUM_DISTS)

parameters.name: eflux
parameters.description: Differential burst-mode ion energy flux array with dimensions (96, 64, NUM_DISTS) (as plasmagrams)

parameters.name: eflux_movie
parameters.description: ---> Plasmagram movie

parameters.name: eflux_byE_atA
parameters.description: ---> Spectrograms by energy at sample pitch angle bin nos (of varying pitch angle)

parameters.name: eflux_byA_atE
parameters.description: ---> Spectrograms by pitch angle bin nos (of varying pitch angle) at sample energies

parameters.name: data_audio
parameters.description: Burst Ion Raw Counts data as audio

parameters.name: pitch_angle_median
parameters.description: median pitch angle

parameters.name: energy_median
parameters.description: ---> median energy

parameters.name: energy_full
parameters.description: Energy values for each distribution (96, 64, NUM_DISTS)

parameters.name: denergy_full
parameters.description: Energy bin size for each distribution (96, 64, NUM_DISTS)

parameters.name: pitch_angle
parameters.description: ---> Pitch Angle values for each distribution (96, 64, NUM_DISTS)

parameters.name: domega
parameters.description: ---> Solid angle (DOmega) for each distribution (96, 64, NUM_DISTS)

parameters.name: orbit_number
parameters.description: Orbit number for this file, does not change, so only 2 entries per file

parameters.name: compno_96
parameters.description: Energy Bin No

parameters.name: compno_64
parameters.description: PA Bin No
